description: Extract data from any document type in a consistent structure with fine-tuned         vLLMs for the highest accuracy

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

inputs.name: prompts
inputs.info: The prompts used to describe the image. Default prompt is Describe the image in detail.                 You can pass a list of comma-separated prompts to extract different information from the image.

inputs.name: url
inputs.info: The image or document url. Not required if file_store_key is specified.

inputs.name: file_store_key
inputs.info: The key used to store the image on Jigsawstack File Storage. Not required if url is specified.

inputs.name: page_range_start
inputs.info: Page range start limit for the document. If not specified, all pages will be processed.

inputs.name: page_range_end
inputs.info: Page range end limit for the document. If not specified, all pages will be processed.
